ShaneHarvey.message: DRIVERS-2393 Automatically set featureFlagLoadBalancer on >=5.0.7,<6.1.0 when loadBalancerPort is enabled (#292)

Require pymongo>=3.6 for MongoDB 5.1 support

MongoDB 5.1 removes support for OP_QUERY so pymongo>=3.6 is required.
BUMP 0.7.1.dev0
PYTHON-2589 Fix slaveDelay -> secondaryDelaySecs name upgrade (#285)
PYTHON-2470 Upgrade from pymongo 3.5.1 to 3.X latest (#284)
Ensure createUser succeeds on all replica set members (#282)
Create admin user with both SCRAM-SHA-256 and SCRAM-SHA-1 (#281)

Redirect mongo startup errors (written to stdout/stderr) to the MO log (#280)

Check that the server is still alive when a waiting for it to start accepting connections.

Revert "Capture mongo stdout/stderr to the server's log file (#279)"

This reverts commit 977fcc0128e691f3aedf3b7412ed808bb7215299.

Capture mongo stdout/stderr to the server's log file (#279)

Check that the server is still alive when a waiting for a server to start
accepting connections.
PYTHON-2067 Update to CherryPy<9.0.0 for experimental Python 3.8 support
PYTHON-1790 Increase maxTransactionLockRequestTimeoutMillis (#270)
PYTHON-1773 Allow starting clusters with enableTestCommands=0 (#269)

SPEC-1168 Decrease transactionLifetimeLimitSeconds on 4.2 by default (#267)

Fixes #266.

Add workaround for SERVER-37631 (#265)

Run refreshLogicalSessionCacheNow on the config server and mongos(es).
Fixes #264.

Enable ztsd compression by default on >=4.1.7 (#263)

Fixes #262.
Start work on 0.6.13
BUMP 0.6.12
Mention alternative way to run MO script
Add 5 second create_connection timeout
Increase default mongo logging verbosity (#255)
Start work on 0.6.12

Fix shutdown logic (#253)

Don't wait forever for the server to shutdown.
Retry the shutdown command once.

Revert "Use process.terminate instead of the shutdown command (#248)"

This reverts commit d65df65e5b7ad5f971439225289c37c584857b2a.
Use process.terminate instead of the shutdown command (#248)
BUMP 0.6.11

Stop servers with the shutdown command before killing forcefully (#243)

Wait for repair to complete and log the attempt.
Default to logappend.
Fix TypeError when logging auth failure (#242)

Enable ipv6 on all servers if any have it enabled (#240)

Add default bind_ip when enabling ipv6.
Fixes #239.

Use SCRAM-SHA-1 on MongoDB >= 3.7.2 (#238)

This allows starting >=3.7.3 servers with auth.
Do not use pymongo 3.6.0.
Start work on 0.6.11.
Automatically enable compression with MongoDB >= 3.4. (#233)
Reduce isMaster waiting time from 2.5 hours to 3 minutes.

Do not run currentOp due to SERVER-30084.

Remove the used "locked" field.

jmikola.message:
DRIVERS-2190: Update certs with SHA256 signatures (#290)

These files were copied from mongodb-labs/drivers-evergreen-tools@0d7e58449f074f77c6a29d68b8b391ab6b2c7ff0

The cluster_cert.pem file was removed as there was no equivalent to copy; however, sslPEMKeyFile is used in absence of sslClusterFile so this should be of little consequence for the related tests.

DRIVERS-1996: Granted backup and restore roles to users (#288)

These permissions are necessary to work with non-system collections in the "local" database.

DmitryLukyanov.message: CSHARP-2891: Reduce periodicNoopIntervalSecs for faster driver change stream testing. (#283)

patrickfreed.message:
Wait for daemon to fully terminate in "stop" (#276)

Stop waits for child mongo processes to terminate.
Remove incorrect logPath deletion.

jaraco.message: Use socket.create_connection to create the connection, supporting IPv6-bound servers and fixes #237. (#258)
Avoid recommending use of direct invocation of setup.py; use pip instead. (#257)

ajdavis.message:
Merge pull request #247 from 10gen/mmapv1

Remove nssize and smallfiles startup options

Remove noprealloc startup option

The option isn't documented anymore and may be MMAPv1-specific.

Remove nssize and smallfiles startup options

Removed in 4.2, see SERVER-35715 and SERVER-35984.

Merge pull request #232 from ShaneHarvey/reduce-waiting-time

Reduce isMaster waiting time from 2.5 hours to 3 minutes.

Merge pull request #231 from ShaneHarvey/remove-locked-reporting

Do not run currentOp due to SERVER-30084.

Merge pull request #230 from 10gen/remove-nohttpinterface

Don't start mongod with --nohttpinterface

Don't start mongod with --nohttpinterface

MongoDB 3.5.7+ no longer recognizes this option, SERVER-29000.

Merge pull request #224 from ShaneHarvey/issue-223

Include timestamps in logs by default

PyMongo 3 compatibility.

MongoClient() no longer raises if it can't connect, must attempt
an operation to know if the server is available.
Fix tests that use MONGOBIN environment variable.
